channel.title: Pinterest on The DIY Blogger
channel.description: Recent content in Pinterest on The DIY Blogger

item.title: How to set up a Pinterest Business Account
item.description: If you have a website that you want to drive insane amounts of traffic to, it is critical that one of the first steps you do is set up a Pinterest Business Account. First, if you are new to Pinterest, then the first lesson is to realize that Pinterest is a search engine. It’s not a social website (like Twitter or Facebook). It’s not just an idea’s tool to save your bookmarks.
